The CultCast episode 709: Best folding iPhone rumor yet?

Use offer code CultCast at checkout to get 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.

This week’s stories:

  • Folding iPhone could favor portability over screen size: Research firm TrendForce says it will feature a 5.5-inch external display and a 7.8-inch internal screen.
  • iOS 27 could have a surprising focus: iOS 27 developers will reportedly concentrate on a user interface revamp needed for the folding iPhone coming in 2026.
  • M5 iPad Pro might tackle Face ID’s biggest weakness: Apple will reportedly add a second portrait camera to the iPad Pro refresh this year, enabling Face ID to work in portrait orientation.
  • iOS 26 beta 4: All the new features and changes: The fourth iOS 26 beta tweaks the Liquid Glass design again, increasing the transparency once more.
